about_the_game:
Scramble Up! is a fast-paced word puzzle game set against the backdrop of ancient Egyptian pyramids. Test your vocabulary skills as you ascend through a series of pyramids, rearranging letters to form new words on each level. Your goal? To scramble your way to the top, one word at a time, before time runs out!

Game Overview:

In Scramble Up!, you begin at the base of a pyramid with a word that has each letter occupying a block. As you move up the pyramid, you must rearrange all but one letter on the row above to form a new word, continuing this process until you reach the top. The game starts simple but quickly grows more challenging as the pyramids get larger and the words longer.

With each successfully completed word, you’ll add time to your countdown clock. Speed and word complexity are key as you race against time to complete each pyramid. Think fast, scramble wisely, and ascend to victory!

Key Features:

• Addictive Word Puzzle Gameplay: Rearrange letters to form new words in a unique pyramid format.
• Timer-Based Challenge: Keep the clock ticking by forming valid words and earning time bonuses.
• Progressive Difficulty: Start with simple pyramids and work your way up to more challenging ones with longer starting words.
• Egyptian-Themed Visuals: Enjoy a vibrant and engaging backdrop inspired by ancient Egypt.
• Scoring System: Earn points based on word complexity and how quickly you submit your words.
• Endless Replayability: Each play-through offers new words and pyramid structures, keeping the gameplay fresh and challenging.

Can you master the pyramid and discover the secrets within?
